hero_description: Join the mystery. Shape the story. Become an accomplice in truth.
signup_section_description: Be the first to know when the investigation begins.
signup_form_footer_text: No spam, just mysteries. Unsubscribe at any time.
twitter_share_text: The Investigation Begins - Join the Elusive Origin community
email_share_body: Check out Elusive Origin - an immersive cultural investigation platform

testimonials.quote: This is exactly what the cultural space needs - authentic mystery and community.
testimonials.name: Alex Martinez

testimonials.quote: The anticipation is building. Can't wait to be part of this investigation.
testimonials.name: Sam Johnson

why_join_features.title: Authentic Cultural Experiences
why_join_features.description: Participate in carefully crafted cultural investigations that celebrate heritage and storytelling.

why_join_features.title: Community Connection
why_join_features.description: Connect with fellow investigators and creators in a space designed for meaningful engagement.

why_join_features.title: Early Access
why_join_features.description: Get exclusive access to events, tools, and community features before they're public.

faq_items.question: When does the first event launch?
faq_items.answer: Our inaugural investigation event is scheduled for **August 2025**. Early access begins shortly before the official launch.

faq_items.question: What is the Vessel app?
faq_items.answer: Vessel is our companion mobile app that will serve as your investigation toolkit - featuring clue tracking, community discussions, and cultural content.

faq_items.question: How much does it cost?
faq_items.answer: We'll announce pricing details closer to launch. Early subscribers will receive special access and pricing information first.
